mapper.insert: INSERT INTO costs (cost, service_id, detail_id) VALUES (#{cost}, #{serviceId}, #{detailId})
mapper.update: UPDATE costs SET cost = #{cost.cost} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.sql: SELECT c.id, c.cost, s.id, s.name, s.price, s.hours_to_do, cars.id, cars.brand, cars.model, cars.year, d.id, d.name, com.id, com.name, com.address, det.id, det.name, det.price, det.in_stock, det.delivery_days d.id, d.name, com.id, com.name, com.address FROM costs c LEFT JOIN services s on c.service_id = s.id LEFT JOIN cars on s.car_id = cars.id LEFT JOIN departments d on s.department_id = d.id LEFT JOIN companies com on d.company_id = c.id LEFT JOIN details det on c.detail_id = det.id
